data.title: Tobu Railway company profile
data.meta_description: In 2022 the revenue of Tobu Railway grew by 21.5%, after peaking in 2019. The company engages in the sector 'Railway Transportation'.
data.text:
All companiesTobu Railway

Tobu Railway

Tobu Railway was founded in 1897 and operates in Sumida, Japan. The company engages in the sector 'Railway Transportation' (ISIC: 491). The industry belongs to the broader 'Land & Pipeline Transportation' (ISIC: 49) sector which includes the transport of passengers and freight via road and rail, as well as freight transport via pipelines.
